translation.app.title: Phase 10 Game Data
translation.game_stats.no_game_selected: Select or create a game first.
translation.game_stats.player_stats.points: Has {points, plural, =0 {no points} =1 {# point} other {# points}}
translation.game_list.no_games: You did not create any games yet.
translation.game_list.delete_game.text: Are you sure you want to delete this game?

translation.export_modal.title: Export
translation.export_modal.close_notice: Do not close this window once you start downloading the backup on another device.
translation.import_modal.title: Importieren
translation.import_modal.save_game_warning: All saved games will be overwritten.
translation.import_modal.downloading: Downloaded {chunks, plural, =1 {# Chunk} other {# Chunks}} from {total, plural, =1 {# Chunk} other {# Chunks}}
translation.import_modal.download_cancel_info: You can continue or cancel once the download has completed.
translation.import_modal.error.backup_not_found: The server does not recognise this backup.
translation.import_modal.error.invalid_server_respon: The API sent an invalid response.
translation.import_modal.error.chunk_not_found: Failed downloading a chunk. No, I am not programmed to handle this.
